page.title: DeadAir T Files
page.t: The Federation is democratic and very liberal in a world full of dictators and oligarchies. The Daldari State was once part of the Federation, but a severe dispute resulted in their departure and a long war between the Gallente Federation and the Daldari State. The Gallenteans are the masters of pleasure and entertainment and their rich trade empire has given the world many of its most glorious and extravagant sights.
Gallente Capital Ship Building Module Licence
Gallente Ancillary Ship Building Module Licence

Consists of two components: a shell of titanium and a core of antimatter atoms suspended in plasma state. Railguns launch the shell directly, while particle blasters pump the plasma into a cyclotron and process the plasma into a bolt that is then fired.

Consists of two components: a shell of titanium and a core of lead atoms suspended in a plasma state. Railguns launch the shell directly, while particle blasters pump the plasma into a cyclotron and process the plasma into a bolt that is then fired.

Consists of two components: a shell of titanium and a core of iron atoms suspended in a plasma state. Railguns launch the shell directly, while particle blasters pump the plasma into a cyclotron and process the plasma into a bolt that is then fired.
Righteous fury given form, this weapon system rains a firestorm of unmatched raw destruction upon its target.
I have important news! It looks like the Gallente are trying to activate a gate. I have added new research.
A by-product of Jove warp research, this will allow activation of particular inactive gates using a large amount of energy.
Incredible! The gates are coming online. I wonder if we can work with other factions to activate more.
I have important news! We can activate new gates into Gallente space. Let us show them the power of science! I have added new research.
